features: ALL NATURAL BAR SOAP FOR JIU JITSU, WRESTLING, & MMA. Protective ingredient blend includes tea tree oil, lemongrass essential oil, and peppermint essential oil.

BODY SOAP THAT SMELLS AMAZING. Sweet yet subtle scent of lavender and clove essential oils. Specially mixed with tea tree oil, rosemary oil, and cassia to create an ideal combo. Smells great while keeping skin clean, healthy, and feeling good.
PROTECTS AND HYDRATES SKIN. Powerful base blend includes saponified oils of sunflower, coconut, palm, and safflower, and mango butter and shea butter to help soften skin.
PREFERRED BY ATHLETES. Whether you engage in contact-based sports or use shared gym equipment, Spar Soap has you covered. Stay clean so you can keep training hard on the mats.

MADE BY ATHLETES FOR ATHLETES IN THE USA. 100% vegan. 100% recyclable packaging. No animal testing. Made in USA through cold process techniques. Products are made in small batches to ensure quality control and each item is pH-tested at the time of production.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE SPAR SOAP MISSION DEFENSIVE PROPERTIES Tea Tree Oil Because of its protective properties, tea tree oil is excellent for skin health. While it fights off germs, it also creates a healthier environment for your skin overall, which is important for longterm health. Lavender Oil Lavender oil is an essential oil derived from flowers of the lavender plant. Research shows that it has protective skin benefits and helps reduce inflammation. Activated Charcoal Researchers have found that activated charcoal can draw germs, chemicals, dirt, and other micro-particles to the surface of the skin, making it easier to remove them from your body. One study even suggests that activated charcoal cleans skin by enlarging pores and removing dirt and dead cells.
Spar Soap on Amazon Check out our Amazon products and get your soap today!
WHY WE LOVE SPAR SOAP Why do our customers love Spar Soap? Spar Soap removes gym funk.Spar Soap helps you avoid missed training time.Spar Soap is made with natural, moisturizing ingredients.

CREATED BY ATHLETES FOR ATHLETES STAY CLEAN You may not have control over your gym’s cleanliness, but you can control your own actions. Wash up before, during, and after your gym visit to prevent issues. Washing your hands makes a bigger difference than you probably thought possible. It not only keeps your hands clean, it keeps the overall environment clean. This should go without saying, but if you have a skin issue, don’t train. Covering it up doesn’t count - keep everyone safe by waiting until you are all clear. Make sure any cuts are covered before you hit the gym to reduce the chance of skin trouble.

SPAR SOAP FEATURES OUR SOAPS Why Lavender? Combing lavender oil with other oils like clove, cinnamon, and tea tree enhances its protective properties, making it a powerful ingredient to have in your soap. Why Activated Charcoal? Activated charcoal can help naturally defend your skin against germs. Fun fact - in a 2018 study, non-charcoal toothbrushes were found to have almost twice the amount of germs that charcoal toothbrushes had after one week of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I REALLY LOVE THIS SOAP!
reviews.reviewText: I just tried this soap, and it is a WONDERFUL! This is great for those who don't want to use soaps with chemicals but still feel clean and protected. I have discovered being diabetic, that, skincare needs change. I get acne now, and I'm almost 60! I break out so easily and my go to soaps don't seem to work for me anymore. And the smell: let me tell you, it makes the bathroom smell naturally nice and that was before I used it. Honestly, I really like the herbal fresh scent and I can still smell it after I get out of the shower. It smells like homemade herbal soap. I have made soap from scratch in the past and this soap is special. For those who cannot smell it after they use it, they may be a little nose blind, because this is a scented soap. I could smell it outside the bathroom door after the shower. It's really pleasant. I will definitely buy again and stock up when I can afford to. It's a great minimalist soap for someone who doesn't want to wear perfume or cologne, but they want to smell nice. It's a great unisex soap. My son didn't like the smell but that only means it will be there waiting for me when I need it. Thank you SPAR! ☺

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for jock itch
reviews.reviewText: I have been suffering with jock it for years. And trying many different soaps and ointments for years. Nothing out there worked. This soap works the best ever. 👌 Nice smell and lathers good. My whole body smells fresh and clean after each shower. I will buy it again for sure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does little to relieve itchy skin
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to wash a bacterial wound while healing. Some itchiness and lite burning sensation was present. Hoped the tree tea oil in addition to other advertised components would help reducing the symptoms, unfortunately did not. The soap does lather well, has a good scent, but not much of a calming or soothing effect as expected. Still giving it a high rating as it does have a good cleaning effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product in a brick shape.
reviews.reviewText: I chose to buy Spar because it was a bit less expensive than Defense. It is my guess that the folks at Spar were able to save money by using a mold for producing their soap that is totally angular. So that resulting shape may take a bit getting use to until the bar "wears down" to a more rounded shape. Just something to be aware of. The most important thing is the effectiveness of the product. And Spar seems to be effective from my experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value alternative to Defense soap
reviews.reviewText: SPAR soap has proven to be just as effective as Defense for my wrestler. He prefers the SPAR scent and these are 3 generously sized bars of soap and a value comparatively. My son would like to see this available in a travel size to more easily take to away meets and to keep in his school athletic locker, but we managed to cut these bars in half and in thirds to fit more easily into travel soap containers. He is on bar #4 bar so far this season and we'll buy again as needed for off season training.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars My only complaint isn’t about the soap itself
reviews.reviewText: This is great soap. Smells great and lathers well and have no complaints on the quality. So I buy the soaps in packages of 3, and my only complaint is that the packaging for the 3 pack is absolutely terrible. I’ve bought two three packs so far and both of them I had to use duct tape so the soap doesn’t fall out the bottom of the box. I’m only giving three stars due to the poor packaging, otherwise it’s a 5!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin feels moisturized and refreshed
reviews.reviewText: I had a small spot on my arm I wanted to have some anti fungal soap for. Little did I know this soap is so moisturizing and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin.
